医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新研究揭示零售市场蓝莓质量差异研究发现，一些采前和采后因素可能会影响蓝莓的品质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/New-study-reveals-blueberry-quality-discrepancies-at-retail-markets.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/New-study-reveals-blueberry-quality-discrepancies-at-retail-markets.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e906894b-daa8-4147-8e33-38f6fe926294 Mon, 10 Jul 2023 05:25:00 -0400 New study reveals blueberry quality discrepancies at retail markets
PacBio 的 Revio 长读长测序系统帮助 Bioscientia 解决复杂的遗传案例PacBio 是高质量、高精度测序解决方案的领先开发商，今天宣布 Bioscientia 正在使用其 Revio 长读长测序系统来扩展其基因组学研究项目，每年对数千个人类基因组进行测序。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/PacBios-Revio-long-read-sequencing-system-to-help-Bioscientia-solve-complex-genic-cases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/PacBios-Revio-long-read-sequencing-system-to-help-Bioscientia-solve-complex-genic-cases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5cf3db6a-3d59-4d2d-97da-ba8324069bab Mon, 10 Jul 2023 02:53:00 -0400 PacBio's Revio long-read sequencing system to help Bioscientia solve complex genetic cases
礼来公司 (Lilly) 的突破性 UC 疗法获得 MHRA 在英国的营销授权礼来公司 (Eli Lilly and Company) 今天宣布，药品和保健品监管局 (MHRA) 已授予 mirikizumab (OMVOH®) 上市许可 (MA)，用于治疗对药物治疗反应不足的中度至重度活动性溃疡性结肠炎成年患者。对常规疗法或生物疗法失去反应或不耐受。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Lilly-granted-MHRA-marketing-authorization-in-Great-Britain-for-a-ground-writing-UC-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Lilly-granted-MHRA-marketing-authorization-in-Great-Britain-for-a-ground-writing-UC-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=04d9dda6-60c8-4a3e-ace3-13cd2d8e09a5 Mon, 10 Jul 2023 02:49:00 -0400 Lilly granted MHRA marketing authorization in Great Britain for a ground-breaking UC therapy
皮质折叠异常与重度抑郁症有关重度抑郁症 (MDD) 是一种复杂且使人衰弱的金属疾病。鉴于其复杂性和广泛性，MDD 一直是医学研究的热点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Abnormal-cortical-folding-linked-to-major-depressive-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Abnormal-cortical-folding-linked-to-major-depressive-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=291e8200-f41e-42b4-9b5d-c3e71e3cb82b Mon, 10 Jul 2023 02:38:00 -0400 Abnormal cortical folding linked to major depressive disorder
裸盖菇素辅助疗法可能为治疗重度抑郁症提供更具成本效益的解决方案迷幻药领域顶尖学者的一项新研究发现，与目前使用的方法相比，裸盖菇素联合治疗在治疗重度抑郁症方面可能更具成本效益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Psilocybin-assistance-therapy-may-provide-more-cost- effective-solution-to-treating-major-depression-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Psilocybin-assistance-therapy-may-provide-more-cost-efficient-solution-to-treating-major-depression-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=42802491-e387-4532-9beb-5d510de28519 Mon, 10 Jul 2023 02:35:00 -0400 Psilocybin-assisted therapy may provide more cost-effective solution to treating major depression disorder
四只爪子强调 2023 年世界人畜共患病日和高致病性禽流感的爆发今天，在世界人畜共患病日，全球动物福利组织“四爪”指出，各国政府尚未从 COVID-19 中汲取教训，即必须共同解决人类、环境和动物健康问题，以防止另一场大流行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/FOUR-PAWS-highlights-World-Zoonoses-Day-2023-and-outbreak-of-Highly-Pathogenic-Avian-Influenza.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/FOUR-PAWS-highlights-World-Zoonoses-Day-2023-and-outbreak-of-Highly-Pathogenic-Avian-Influenza.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a6b1e6c-c0b7-4513-b4a9-2897371d4f22 Mon, 10 Jul 2023 02:31:00 -0400 FOUR PAWS highlights World Zoonoses Day 2023 and outbreak of Highly Pathogenic Avian Influenza
新的 DNA 修复测试可能彻底改变遗传性疾病和癌症的治疗一种可以了解化疗、放疗或基因治疗对个体患者效果如何的个性化测试现已获得英国、美国、欧盟和日本的专利批准。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/New-DNA-repair-test-could-revolutionize-treatment-for-genic-disorders-and-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/New-DNA-repair-test-could-revolutionize-treatment-for-genic-disorders-and-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=77f9eb9d-c9f3-4946-921f-92aece1f48fe Mon, 10 Jul 2023 02:26:00 -0400 New DNA repair test could revolutionize treatment for genetic disorders and cancers
Moderna 提供了 RSV 候选疫苗 mRNA-1345 监管提交的最新信息Moderna, Inc. 是一家开创信使 RNA (mRNA) 疗法和疫苗的生物技术公司，今天提供了 mRNA-1345 监管提交的最新信息，mRNA-1345 是一种用于预防 RSV 相关下呼吸道疾病 (RSV-LRTD) 和急性呼吸道疾病的疫苗。 60 岁或以上成年人的呼吸道疾病 (ARD)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Moderna-provides-an-update-on-regulatory-submissions-for-RSV-vaccine-candidate-mRNA-1345.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Moderna-provides-an-update-on-regulatory-submissions-for-RSV-vaccine-candidate-mRNA-1345.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54d768e2-e846-454d-bc36-eca0640d014b Mon, 10 Jul 2023 02:23:00 -0400 Moderna provides an update on regulatory submissions for RSV vaccine candidate, mRNA-1345
研究表明，创伤性脑损伤后的抑郁症可能与其他原因引起的抑郁症不同由麻省总医院布莱根妇女医院 (Brigham and Women's Hospital)（麻省总医院布莱根医疗保健系统的创始成员）的 Shan Siddiqi 医学博士领导的一项新研究表明，创伤性脑损伤 (TBI) 后的抑郁症可能是一种临床上独特的疾病，而不是传统的重度抑郁症。对患者治疗有影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Depression-after-TBI-may-not-be-the-same-as-depression-lated-to-other-causes-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Depression-after-TBI-may-not-be-the-same-as-depression-lated-to-other-causes-study-suggests.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=44571aec-0e02-448d-8bc1-1826253fbe5f Mon, 10 Jul 2023 02:20:00 -0400 Depression after TBI may not be the same as depression related to other causes, study suggests
报告对英国人如何度过时间进行了精彩的洞察英国国家统计局 (ONS) 的一份新报告以引人入胜的细节揭示了我们在三月份如何度过的，一位领先的测试专家表示这不健康！英国人每天花两个小时看电视，超过 45 分钟浏览电脑和设备，但只有 20 分钟进行健身活动，这比新冠疫情最严重时要少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Report-gives-fascinating-insight-into-how-Brits-spend-their-time.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Report-gives-fascinating-insight-into-how-Brits-spend-their-time.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=63d02e9e-ba85-48cf-8783-fde223003960 Mon, 10 Jul 2023 02:13:00 -0400 Report gives fascinating insight into how Brits spend their time
